name: Bullish Chart
imagePrompt: A glowing, holographic chart tablet that pulsates with green lines and 'bullish' arrows, with a stylized 'DANK' logo. It looks like a high-tech data analysis tool, wielded with expertise.
abilityText: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack. 'Solid.'
flavorText: Some say he sees the future. Others say he just scrolls CT. His calls are... solid.
